Ad Text:
The Business Insights & Data Interpretation Manager will play a key role in driving data-driven decision-making within the Technology department of the Transport & Distribution industry. This temporary role based in Melbourne requires a strong ability to analyse and interpret data to provide actionable insights.

Client Details

This opportunity is with a well-established organisation in the Transport & Distribution sector. They are a medium-sized company known for their commitment to innovation and operational excellence in Melbourne.

Description

Analyse complex datasets to uncover trends and actionable insights.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and provide data-driven solutions.
Develop and maintain dashboards and reporting tools to support decision-making.
Ensure data integrity and accuracy through thorough validation and quality checks.
Communicate findings and recommendations clearly to stakeholders.
Support the Technology department with predictive and prescriptive analytics.

Profile

A successful Business Insights & Data Interpretation Manager should have:

Strong analytical skills with experience in data interpretation and insights generation.
Strong experience using Power BI to interpret and consume business insights.
Advanced Excel skills.
Knowledge of the Transport & Distribution industry is advantageous.
Excellent communication skills to present findings effectively.
A proactive approach to problem-solving and identifying opportunities for improvement.
Ability to collaborate with diverse teams and stakeholders.
Proven experience in maintaining data quality and integrity.

Job Offer

Opportunity to contribute to impactful projects in the Transport & Distribution industry.
Be part of a collaborative and supportive team in Melbourne.
Temporary role offering flexibility and career development opportunities.

If you are passionate about leveraging data to drive business success, we encourage you to apply for the Business Insights & Data Interpretation Manager position in Melbourne today!
